1154460.name: Furries & Scalies: Love's Lizards Lost, Charity Pack: More Stuff
1154460.description:
So, some backgrounds were paid for and then not used. Now they get to see the light of day. Along with the typical new scene (where you get a chance to improve relations with people) and status point boost.

Also, the soundtrack. So there's that, too.

TO INSTALL:

- Download

- There will now be an option in your home base to turn the prototype backgrounds on and off.

About the Trevor Project


The Trevor Project is a national hot line dedicated to providing crisis intervention and suicide prevention for today's LBGTQ+ youth.
